attributes.action: AWARD THE VILLAGE OF WOOTON BASSETT FOR SERVICES TO THE ARMED FORCES AND THE NATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of Wooton Bassett have shown the greatest respect to the dead from Afghanistan and previously Iraq.
Standing as representatives of the whole of the United Kingdom and giving support to the families and friends by showing we, the people respect our armed forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
